entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 30%
